name: Shapes to train past material
description: This experiment was designed to revise outdated study material and introduce new material. The concept was to make two different kinds of forms, each with their own special variables, and to prompt the background to change colour when an ellipse collides with a canvas frame.
background: The work relates back to the complexity lecture,more specifically the one that introduces velocity, acceleration, and stimulates to use classes for two different figures to set distinctive constants.

name: Shapes to train past material and training with velocity and accleeration
description: This experiment was designed to revise outdated study material and introduce new material. The concept was to make two different kinds of forms, two classes, gradient colors, background changes when ellipes collides with screen.
background: The work relates back to the complexity lecture,more specifically the one that introduces velocity, acceleration, and stimulates to use classes for two different figures to set distinctive constants.

name: Puddles and pebbles
description: I conducted research on the randomness condition of ellipses and lines. The objective was to utilize simple shapes to highlight a random location on the map. Consequently, this led to the creation of a visually pleasing abstract composition that is unique and evokes the image of pebbles skipping across the water.
background: The system described here pertains to the concept of a visually appealing artwork that is continuously renewed by the system itself. It specifically relates to the introductory lecture of the Creative Coding Course.

name: Bloody snickers
description: The idea is to generate random width and spacing for strokes/rectangles. Canvas generates random spacing and Strokeweight of lines itself. The puporse is to procceed an aesthethic self-recreating system.
background: The project is focused on the initial lectures of creative coding course and aims to cover topics such as repeating loops, randomness, and more.

name: Transformations of ellipses
description: A p5.js sketch that generates an abstract composition of ellipses on a canvas. The sketch utilizes the concepts of randomness and noise to create dynamic variations in the size and position of the ellipses.
background: The main idea is to use simple shapes and random transformations to create a visually pleasing and unique composition.
